page.title: 16POLICE IN IRONBRIDGE
page.content: The little police unit in Ironbridge was opened in 1970. PC Cavendish, the local policeman, has been with the police force for 12 years. When he is on his rounds his orders come from the police station at Malinsgate, Telford Town Centre. In this area police help the public find their lost dogs or by telling them where to find certain places,they also help in accidents such as crashes where they have to find out whose fault it was. PC Cavendish is mainly on foot or bicycle, but if there is a shortage of policemen, he drives a panda car. The main problem in Ironbridge is traffic especially on Bank Holidays. In the past few years there have been two fatal accidents killing five people and injuring eight.
